channel.title: Mind tiara?
channel.description:
Hello, I want to get my runecrafting up, can you get runecrafting xp by making mind tiara's? I have 31 crafting.
Also, if they do, how do you make them.
Thanks.

item.title: Mind tiara?
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Airs are quick n easy exp.

Also mind runes but they take a while since the bank isn’t so close.

Read full topic

item.title: Mind tiara?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

You have to have one mind talisman and one tiara. Take them to an altar and I think you use one of the items on the altar and it’ll make a tiara out of it.

It’s probably the worst way to get runecrafting XP. Better off running some type of rune.

Read full topic
